description:
To Chibi Panda and Gao`s dismay, Batzz shows no interest in the World Buddy Masters. Worse still, his rampages cause city-wide blackouts. Chibi Panda learns the rules of Buddyfight, while Gaito and Abygale challenge Gao and Batzz to a match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Batzz Chikyuu e! Chou Higashi Odoroki Dai Panic!!
Batzz Goes to Earth! Major Panic in Cho-Tokyo!
バッツ地球へ! 超東驚大パニック!!
